dialog_lines.line: Oh hey, you're the guy who delivered the livestock.
I need someone to deliver a shipment of medicine to Lochley Wharf.
Is that your ship? How in The Isles did you make it this far in a dinghy?
This medicine is too importantâ€¦ but you're the only available ship.
I have a cousin that can get your boat stable enough to transport this very important cargo.
Find some more crew members, and you'll have yourself a bigger ship.
